_meanings:
{@--2@} An offering to the Manes of 
deceased parents or other relatives, a
libation of water &c. at the Śrāddha
ceremony; {#eko nivApasalilaM#} 
{#pibasItyayuktaM#} <ls>Māl. 9. 40</ls>; {#nivApadattiBiH#}  
<ls>R. 8. 86</ls>; {#nivApAMjalayaH pitFRAM#} <ls n="R.">5. 8</ls>,  
<ls n="R.">15. 91</ls>, <ls>Mu. 4. 5.</ls>

{@--3@} A gift or offering
in general.
